channel.title: Go Questions on Ricky
channel.description: Recent content in Go Questions on Ricky

item.title: Array
item.description: array package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { a := [5]int{1, 2, 3, 4, 5} t := a[3:4:4] fmt.Println(t[0]) } A. 3 B. 4 C. compilation error Answer B

item.title: Channel
item.description: channel package main import ( "fmt" "time" ) func main() { ch := make(chan int, 1000) go func() { for i := 0; i < 10; i++ { ch <- i } }() go func() { for { a, ok := <-ch if !ok { fmt.Println("close") return } fmt.Println("a: ", a) } }() close(ch) fmt.Println("ok") time.Sleep(time.Second * 100) } Answer ok panic: send on closed channel channel1 package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { c := make(chan int) close(c) val, _ := <-c fmt.

item.title: Context
item.description: context package main import ( "context" "fmt" ) func f(ctx context.Context) { context.WithValue(ctx, "foo", -6) } func main() { ctx := context.TODO() f(ctx) fmt.Println(ctx.Value("foo")) } A. -6 B. 0 C. <nil> D: panic Answer C context1 package main import( "fmt" "encoding/json" "context" ) func main() { data, _ := json.Marshal(context.WithValue(context.Background(), "a", "b")) fmt.Println(string(data)) } Answer {"Context":0}

item.title: Defer
item.description: defer package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { defer_call() } func defer_call() { defer func() { fmt.Println("1") }() defer func() { fmt.Println("2") }() defer func() { fmt.Println("3") }() panic("4") } Answer 3 2 1 panic: 4 defer1 package main import ( "fmt" ) type Person struct { age int } func main() { person := &Person{28} defer fmt.Println(person.age) defer func(p *Person) { fmt.Println(p.age) }(person) defer func() { fmt.

item.title: Goroutine
item.description: goroutine package main import ( "fmt" "time" ) func main() { ch1 := make(chan int) go fmt.Println(<-ch1) ch1 <- 5 time.Sleep(1 * time.Second) } A. 5 B. deadlock C. compilation error Answer B

item.title: Interface
item.description: interface package main import ( "fmt" ) type People interface { Show() } type Student struct{} func (stu *Student) Show() { } func live() People { var stu *Student return stu } func main() { if live() == nil { fmt.Println("AAAAAAA") } else { fmt.Println("BBBBBBB") } } Answer BBBBBBB interface1 package main import ( "fmt" ) type People interface { Speak(string) string } type Student struct{} func (stu *Student) Speak(think string) (talk string) { if think == "love" { talk = "You are a good boy" } else { talk = "hi" } return } func main() { var peo People = Student{} think := "love" fmt.

item.title: Iota
item.description: iota package main import "fmt" const ( x = iota _ y z = "zz" k p = iota ) func main() { fmt.Println(x, y, z, k, p) } Answer 0 2 zz zz 5 iota1 package main import "fmt" const ( a = iota b = iota ) const ( name = "name" c = iota d = iota ) func main() { fmt.Println(a, b, c, d) } Answer 0 1 1 2

item.title: JSON
item.description: json package main import ( "encoding/json" "fmt" ) type AutoGenerated struct { Age int `json:"age"` Name string `json:"name"` Child []int `json:"child"` } func main() { jsonStr1 := `{"age": 14,"name": "potter", "child":[1,2,3]}` a := AutoGenerated{} json.Unmarshal([]byte(jsonStr1), &a) aa := a.Child fmt.Println(aa) jsonStr2 := `{"age": 12,"name": "potter", "child":[3,4,5,7,8,9]}` json.Unmarshal([]byte(jsonStr2), &a) fmt.Println(aa) } A. [1 2 3] [1 2 3] B. [1 2 3] [3 4 5] C. [1 2 3] [3 4 5 6 7 8 9] D.

item.title: Len
item.description: len package main func main() { var x *struct { s [][32]byte } println(len(x.s[99])) } A. panic B. compilation error C. 32 D. 0 Answer C len1 package main const s = "Go101.org" // len(s) == 9 // 1 << 9 == 512 // 512 / 128 == 4 var a byte = 1 << len(s) / 128 var b byte = 1 << len(s[:]) / 128 func main() { println(a, b) } A: 0 0 B: 0 4 C: 4 0 D: 4 4 Answer C len2 package main var s = "Go101.

item.title: Map
item.description: map package main import "fmt" type Student struct { Name string } var list map[string]Student func main() { list = make(map[string]Student) student := Student{"Aceld"} list["student"] = student list["student"].Name = "LDB" fmt.Println(list["student"]) } Answer compilation error cannot assign to struct field list["student"].Name in map map1 package main func main() { m := make(map[int]int, 3) x := len(m) m[1] = m[1] y := len(m) println(x, y) } Answer 0 1

item.title: Print
item.description:
print package main import "fmt" type T struct { x int } func (t T) String() string { return "boo" } func main() { t := T{123} fmt.Printf("%v
", t) fmt.Printf("%#v
", t) } Answer boo main.T{x:123} print1 package main import ( "fmt" ) func f(a ...int) { fmt.Printf("%#v
", a) } func main() { f() } Answer []int(nil)

item.title: Race
item.description: race type Stats struct { mutex sync.Mutex counters map[string]int } func (s *Stats) Snapshot() map[string]int { s.mutex.Lock() defer s.mutex.Unlock() return s.counters } func (s *Stats) Add(name string, num int) { s.mutex.Lock() defer s.mutex.Unlock() s.counters[name] = num } Answer func (s *Stats) Snapshot() map[string]int { s.mutex.Lock() defer s.mutex.Unlock() result := make(map[string]int, len(s.counters)) for k, v := range s.counters { result[k] = v } return result }

item.title: Select
item.description: select package main import "sync" func main() { var wg sync.WaitGroup foo := make(chan int) bar := make(chan int) wg.Add(1) go func() { defer wg.Done() select { case foo <- <-bar: default: println("default") } }() wg.Wait() } Answer fatal error: all goroutines are asleep - deadlock! select1 package main import "fmt" func main() { ch1 := make(chan int) ch2 := make(chan int) go func() { ch1 <- 1 }() go func() { select { case <-ch1: case ch2 <- 2: } }() fmt.

item.title: Slice
item.description: slice package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { var s1 []int var s2 = []int{} if __ == nil { fmt.Println("nil slice") } if __ != nil { fmt.Println("empty slice") } } A. s1, s2 B. s2, s1 C. s1, s1 D. s2, s2 Answer A slice1 package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { s := [3]int{1, 2, 3} a := s[:0] b := s[:2] c := s[1:2:cap(s)] fmt.

item.title: Variable
item.description: variable A. p.name B. (&p).name C. (*p).name D. p->name Answer AC variable1 package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { var ans float64 = 15 + 25 + 5.2 fmt.Println(ans) } A. 45 B. 45.0 C. 45.2 D. compliation error Answer C variable2 package main import ( "fmt" ) func main() { var ans float64 = 3 / 2 fmt.Println(ans) } A. 1.5 B. 1 C. 0 D. compliation error Answer B variable3 package main func main() { const a int8 = -1 var b int8 = -128 / a println(b) } Answer compliation error -128 / a (constant 128 of type int8) overflows int8 variable4 package main func main() { var a int8 = -1 var b int8 = -128 / a println(b) } Answer -128 variable5 package main import "fmt" type MyInt1 int type MyInt2 = int func main() { var i int =0 var i1 MyInt1 = i var i2 MyInt2 = i fmt.
